summary: Contoso Wireless offers its newest product, Other, which comes with a variety of features such as high-speed internet connection, unlimited streaming, 24/7 customer support, and a two-year warranty. It has download speeds of up to 50 Mbps and upload speeds of up to 25 Mbps. Customers also get access to the Contoso Wireless app, parental control settings, and various discounts and promotions. The cost for Other is $59.99 per month plus taxes and fees.
